perturbation.original_text: 2.       During the initial one year period beginning on the Amendment Date,          Distributor shall be the only distributor appointed by NETGEAR in [*],          subject to Distributor conducting mutually agreed to marketing          activities as described in the Marketing Plan for [*] to be developed          and agreed to by and between the parties and which shall be attached to          and made a part of this Agreement as Exhibit 4a. For the purposes of          this provision, distributor shall mean a company acquiring products          directly from NETGEAR for resale or license to dealers or other second          tier resellers which in turn resell or license the products to end use          customers. The foregoing notwithstanding, during the [*] and any          subsequent period, NETGEAR reserves the right to sell or license          Products in [*] to customers other than distributors such as, but not          limited to resellers who procure Products at centralized locations for          resale to end-use customers solely through their wholly or majority          owned retail outlets, both store-front and catalog. Following the [*],          for any extension or renewal term, Distributor's appointment as          Distributor shall be non-exclusive and NETGEAR may appoint other          distributors in [*] at its sole discretion.
perturbation.changed_text: 2.       During the initial one year period beginning on the Amendment Date,          Distributor shall be the only distributor appointed by NETGEAR in [*],          subject to Distributor conducting mutually agreed to marketing          activities as described in the Marketing Plan for [*] to be developed          and agreed to by and between the parties and which shall be attached to          and made a part of this Agreement as Exhibit 4a. For the purposes of          this provision, distributor shall mean a company acquiring products          directly from NETGEAR for resale or license to dealers or other second          tier resellers which in turn resell or license the products to end use          customers. The foregoing notwithstanding, during the [*] and any          subsequent period, NETGEAR reserves the right to sell or license          Products in [*] to customers other than distributors such as, but not          limited to resellers who procure Products at centralized locations for          resale to end-use customers solely through their wholly or majority          owned retail outlets, both store-front and catalog. Following the [*],          for any extension or renewal term, Distributor's appointment as          Distributor shall be exclusive and NETGEAR will not appoint other distributors in [*] without the Distributor's written consent, which will not be unreasonably withheld.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that after the initial period, the Distributor's appointment is non-exclusive. The modified text contradicts this by stating the appointment is exclusive in any extension or renewal, and that NETGEAR needs written consent to appoint other distributors. This creates uncertainty about the distribution rights during renewal terms.

perturbation.original_text: The terms and conditions of this Amendment, shall amend and supersede any conflicting terms of the original Agreement. All other terms of the original Agreement shall remain unchanged.
perturbation.changed_text: The terms and conditions of this Amendment, shall amend and supersede any conflicting terms of the original Agreement, except for those related to payment terms, which will default to the original Agreement if there is a conflict. All other terms of the original Agreement shall remain unchanged.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that this amendment supersedes any conflicting terms. The modified text introduces an exception, stating payment terms will default to the original agreement. This contradiction creates uncertainty about which terms govern payment if the amendment changes them.

perturbation.original_text: THIS AMENDMENT (the "Amendment") is entered into this 15th day of July 1998, by and between INGRAM MICRO INC. ("Ingram") and NETGEAR, INC. ("Vendor").
perturbation.changed_text: THIS AMENDMENT (the "Amendment") is entered into this 15th day of July 1998, by and between INGRAM MICRO INC. ("Ingram"), acting through its subsidiary Ingram Micro Services, and NETGEAR, INC. ("Vendor"). However, for purposes of order placement and payment, the 'Ingram' refers solely to Ingram Micro Inc.
perturbation.explanation: The original definition of Ingram is straightforward. The modified text introduces a condition that Ingram is acting through a subsidiary but limits the definition for order placement and payment to the parent company. This creates ambiguity over which entity is legally responsible in different contractual contexts.
